Camping marathon where you gamble with the time you have to play games.

This game had huge potential but turned into a massive waste of time by allowing camping as a strategy, making this mostly about luck, not skill.

通知音を継続して鳴らされた時、私はイヤホンを外してトイレに向かいました。
リザルトのチャット欄は常に閉じましょう。
メンタルに自信がない人はキラーをプレイするのをお勧めしません。

垃圾游戏

・4(生存者)対1(殺人鬼)という特殊なルールのPVP。奥深い対戦が好きなゲーマーなら楽しめるはず。
※ゲームに勝つために必須となる仕様や情報をゲーム内で説明しないため、プレイ前に初心者wikiなどを読んで知識を付けてからでないと50%も楽しめないと思われる。
・洋画ホラーやホラーゲームのクリーチャー・キャラがプレイアブルキャラとして多数登場している。クリーチャー・キャラの3Dモデルの出来が良いので映画好きにもおすすめ。

I have almost 1k hours in the game. It was fun during the first 500 hrs, then got kinda boring because I was mainly playing SWF; I started playing killer a lot more and I had a blast! I mained Rin/Spirit, Pyramid Head, Deathslinger and Trickster and I loved playing them so much. I mainly played Spirit because she’s a sexy badass girlboss <3. Dead By Daylight is a terrible game, but I love playing it! I’m giving it a thumbs down because of all the shit that’s going on right now with the NFT’s. Whether or not BHVR is in involved, they should make a statement on it. For now, the game is uninstalled until further notice and I’ve replaced it with Overwatch :)

Un bon jeu mais je veux revenir sur des points qui m'énerve :
- Les bugs qui ne sont pas régler alors qu'ils sont présent depuis un certain temps
- Le système de MMR qui est surement l'un des pires que j'ai pu voir depuis longtemps
- Une communauté plus toxic que jamais ( on est pas loin du niveau de LoL )

DBD est un bon jeu malgré ça, je le recommande si vous jouez avec des potes franchement vous allez vous tapez une bonne barre, par contre éviter de jouer à ce jeu si vous êtes plutôt "sanguin" ( vous vous énervez vite ) et que vous décidez de jouer tueur ou en survivant en soloQ vous allez plus péter un câble qu'autre chose entre les ragequits, les "toxics" (selon la commu du jeu : camp, tunnel, slug, jouer noed, tbag, etc ), les afk et bien d'autres vous allez pas vous en sortir.
hate this game.

помойка с  читерами в  виде  постоянного сговора убийца + выживший, при входе в  лоббби убийца видит  своего друга по  нику или специальной одежде выжившего, если  нет  переконнектяться  оба пока не стартуют вместе а затем просто вместе убивают всех  и  фармят по  часу очки

As someone who started playing dbd on the ps4 playing on the pc feels like an entirely different experience. I feel like I can appreciate the graphics much more now. I've also learned to appreciate the gameplay on the pc as players are much more fun to play as they were on console. Nonetheless I definitely recommend this game to people who like playing with others online to work as a group together or just like games where you have to think strategically to escape/win.

This is a poorly balanced game with serious technical and design flaws: bad map design, bad FPS integrity, bottom-tier dedicated servers, disconnected development team, and so on.

I've been playing this game on console since it released, and just started on PC, and theses problems have existed since the inception. The game is better now than it was, and seems to have plateaued in terms of design quality and player parity. It's been in this poor state for years now, and each fix breaks something else.

Ultimately, this is a game for bullies to gang up and live out their power fantasies against solo players using poorly designed and ineffective antagonists.

Played over 200hrs on Console before buying on PC. Fun enough game, but the devs care more about selling news DLCs and NFTs than addressing longstanding issues within the game. There is also currently a massive hacking problem at high MMR that they haven't even publicly addressed let alone worked to solve. If Dead by Daylight dies it will be because of developer negligence and greed driving the community away. Get your shit together, Behaviour

If you want to hold m1 and get facecamped then go ahead and git ur super fun gameplay. If you want your favorite killer to become shit and face hackers go right ahead and gouge ur eyes out while your at that masochist shit.
